## Biography
I am a Full Professor at the [Groupe d'analyse et de théorie économique (GATE Lyon Saint-Etienne)](https://www.gate.cnrs.fr/), UMR 5824, [University of Saint-Etienne](https://www.univ-st-etienne.fr/), and the [Saint-Etienne School of Economics (SE2)](https://se2.univ-st-etienne.fr/). Since January 2025, I have served as the **Deputy Director of GATE**, in charge of the Saint-Étienne site. I am also a **Coordinating Editor** at [*Theory and Decision*](https://www.springer.com/journal/11238).
I founded the [Master's program in Political Engineering](https://www.univ-st-etienne.fr/fr/formation/d-u-1/d-u-1/du-introduction-to-political-engineering-KVQTJNB1.html), which later evolved into the [Master's program in Economics and Data for Decision Science (EDDS)](https://se2.univ-st-etienne.fr/fr/etudier-a-se2/les-masters/economics-data-and-decision-science/master-economics-data-and-decision-science.html). I also lead and founded the [Microcertification Artificial Intelligence: Challenges, Opportunities & Practical Cases](https://se2.univ-st-etienne.fr/fr/etudier-a-se2/formation-continue/formation-certifiante-intelligence-artificielle.html).
My academic background spans both mathematics and economics, with a Master's in **Pure Mathematics** from [Université Paris-Saclay](https://www.universite-paris-saclay.fr/) and another in **Theoretical Economics** from [Université Paris 1 Panthéon-Sorbonne](https://www.pantheonsorbonne.fr/). I earned my PhD from Université Paris 1, affiliated with the [Centre d'Economie de la Sorbonne (CES)](https://ces.univ-paris1.fr/) and the [Paris School of Economics (PSE)](https://www.parisschoolofeconomics.eu/), under the supervision of [Michel Grabisch](https://grabisch.univ-paris1.fr/).
My research and teaching center on **theoretical economics**, especially **game theory** and **social choice theory**, with a strong emphasis on the **axiomatic method**.
